===RUNZ Framework===
===RUNZ Framework===
â
[http://hacktolive.org/runz The RUNZ Framework] is a tool that allows the use of [[portable apps]] and something called [http://hacktolive.org/wiki/SuperDebs SuperDebs] (an installer with a .deb file + its dependencies that can be installed offline) in ''Super OS''. It is already included in ''Super OS 9.04 SP 0.1+''<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS_Service_Pack Super OS Service Pack]</ref>
+
[http://hacktolive.org/runz The RUNZ Framework] is a tool that allows the use of [[portable apps]] and something called [http://hacktolive.org/wiki/SuperDebs SuperDebs] (an installer with a .deb file + its dependencies that can be installed offline<ref>http://hacktolive.org/wiki/SuperDebs</ref>) in ''Super OS''. It is already included in ''Super OS 9.04 SP 0.1+''<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS_Service_Pack Super OS Service Pack]</ref>
